block.p: American League YANKEES--Designated OF Felix Jose for assignment. OAKLAND ATHLETICS--Recalled LHP Barry Zito from Sacramento of the PCL. Assigned RHP Scott Service outright to Sacramento. TORONTO BLUE JAYS--Activated SS Alex Gonzalez from the 15-day disabled list. Optioned RHP Leo Estrella to Syracuse of the International League.
National League HOUSTON ASTROS--Unconditionally released LHP Yorkis Perez. Optioned RHP Jose Cabrera to New Orleans of the PCL. Called up RHP Jason Green and LHP Wayne Franklin from New Orleans.

American League YANKEES--Designated OF Felix Jose for assignment. OAKLAND ATHLETICS--Recalled LHP Barry Zito from Sacramento of the PCL. Assigned RHP Scott Service outright to Sacramento. TORONTO BLUE JAYS--Activated SS Alex Gonzalez from the 15-day disabled list. Optioned RHP Leo Estrella to Syracuse of the International League.
National League HOUSTON ASTROS--Unconditionally released LHP Yorkis Perez. Optioned RHP Jose Cabrera to New Orleans of the PCL. Called up RHP Jason Green and LHP Wayne Franklin from New Orleans.
National Football League CAROLINA PANTHERS--Released G Clay Shiver and TE Bryan Arndt. MIAMI DOLPHINS--Waived DE David Hoelscher.
DUKE--Named Chris Collins men's assistant basketball coach.
